nodes.name: DestroyStore
destroy
DestroyStore
destroy

addProduct(bytes30,uint16,uint256).details: Allows the current owner to add a product to the array of products.

params._description: The bytes30 representation of the description of the product .

approveOwnershipTransfer(uint16).details: Allows owner candidate to approve the ownership of the contract.

params._newStoreIndex: The index at which the new store to be set in the new owner's stores array.

buy(uint16,uint16).details: Allows the customers to buy given quantity of a specific product.

params._productIndex: The index of the product in the products array.

decreaseQuantity(uint16,uint16).details: Allows the current owner to decrease the quantity of a product.

params._productIndex: The index of the product in the products array.

destroy().details: Transfers the current marketplace balance to the marketplace and all other funds to the owner.

increaseQuantity(uint16,uint16).details: Allows the current owner to increase the quantity of a product.

params._productIndex: The index of the product in the products array.

marketplaceWithdraw(uint256).details: Allows the marketplace to withdraw taxes from the store.

params._amount: The amount of the funds transferred.

ownerWithdraw(address,uint256).details: Allows the current owner to withdraw funds from the store.

params._amount: The amount of the funds transferred.
params._recipient: The address to transfer the funds to.

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

removeProduct(uint16).details: Allows the current owner to delete a product at a given index of the array of products.

params._productIndex: The index of the product in the products array.

requestOwnershipTransfer(address,uint256.details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a new owner, who has to approve the ownership.

params._ownerCandidate: The address to transfer ownership to.
params._storeIndex: The index of the current store to be transferred.

setPrice(uint16,uint256).details: Allows the current owner to set a price of a product.

params._newPrice: The new price of the product.
params._productIndex: The index of the product in the products array.

setStorefront(uint8,uint16).details: Allows the current owner to encode the storefront of the store.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

updateProduct(uint16,bytes30,uint16,uint.details: Allows the current owner to update a product at a given index of the array of products, including previously deleted products(empty indices).

params._description: The bytes30 representation of the description of the product .
params._productIndex: The index of the product in the products array.

addProduct(bytes30,uint16,uint256).notice: Zero price and quantity are intentionally not forbidden as there might be some business use cases using it (eg. pre-stock marketing).

buy(uint16,uint16).notice: If there is a tip from the msg value it is not returned.

destroy().notice: Using send to prevent DoS by revert from the marketplace address.

requestOwnershipTransfer(address,uint256.notice: The requirement for non-zero address of the `_ownerCandidate` is intentionally omitted due to the two-staged implementation.

setPrice(uint16,uint256).notice: Zero price is intentionally not forbidden as there might be some business use cases using it (eg. sale).

setStorefront(uint8,uint16).notice: The storefront represents up to 16 products using their indices in the products array.

updateProduct(uint16,bytes30,uint16,uint.notice: Zero price and quantity are intentionally not forbidden as there might be some business use cases using it (eg. pre-stock marketing).
